about_the_game:
A high-quality, hand-made sound effects compendium for everything from simple clicks to zips and zaps, though what you use these sounds for is only limited by your imagination.

Buttons, menu options, cancel/confirm, laser beams! It's all there.

 

Every single one of the 200 sounds has been created and sculpted on analog hardware; that means real electronic circuits! They are unique and sure to give any of your projects a special flavour.

 

While potential applications include any type of modern settings, space and cyber environments, you will find that many of the sounds could have very different uses, such as a monster growl or battle effects. Check them all out and play around with Pitch and Tempo!

 

What this pack is NOT: Mimicking of real world everyday sounds such as a creaking wooden door, footsteps on concrete, birds chirping in the woods.

 

●     200 high-quality utility sound effects

●     WAV/m4A/ogg files included

----------------------------

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.

・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker

・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.

What this pack is NOT: Mimicking of real world everyday sounds such as a creaking wooden door, footsteps on concrete, birds chirping in the woods.
